main: Inflicts random statuses and gains buffs based on number of debuffs on his target. Most conditionals max out at 3 debuffs. S2 gains 2 coin reuses. S3 gains some more damage up to 5 debuffs.
other: Passive heals his SP when hitting enemies with 4+ {status:Laceration} and more if they have debuffs. At max SP, it gives him {status:AttackUp} instead.

1010901.desc:
On Hit, if the target has 6+ [Laceration], heal 2 SP.
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 3)
If this unit's SP is at max, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn when this unit heals SP with this effect.
(This Passive activates 4 times max per turn)
1010901.name: Assignment Evaluation

1010902.desc: This Identity only counts as an 'Identity that inflicts [Laceration]'. This Identity's Skills that randomly inflict [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] do not count as Skills that inflict each respective Keyword.
1010902.name: Sanguine Pointillist

1010911.desc:
On Hit, if the target has 4+ [Laceration], heal 2 SP.
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 3)
If this unit's SP is at max, gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn when this unit heals SP with this effect.
(This Passive activates 4 times max per turn)
1010911.name: Assignment Evaluation

1010921.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 2 SP On Hit for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 6)
(This Passive activates 2 times max per turn)
1010921.name: Practices on Aesthetics

1010931.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 2 SP On Hit for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 6)
If the target has [Laceration], heal 3 additional SP.
(This Passive activates 2 times max per turn)
1010931.name: Practices on Aesthetics

Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] Count on target (max 2)

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Laceration] Count. If target has 4+ types of negative effects, inflict +2 additional [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +3 Count for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Laceration]. If target has 4+ types of negative effects, inflict 2 additional [Laceration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
Deal +15% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 75%)

[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or Defeated, inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on 1 enemy with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Laceration] Count. If target has 3+ types of negative effects, inflict +2 additional [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +3 Count for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Laceration]. If target has 3+ types of negative effects, inflict 2 additional [Laceration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
Deal +25% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 125%)

[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or Defeated, inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on 2 enemies with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
